actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that certain air traffic specialists be considered as air traffic controllers be considered as air traffic controllers for retirement and for certain other purposes.

summary.text: Includes within the definition of "air traffic controller," for purposes of Federal air traffic control career programs, those persons who are actively engaged in providing preflight, inflight, or airport advisory service to aircraft operators or are the immediate supervisors of any such persons who are employed in any flight service station facility.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that certain air traffic specialists be considered as air traffic controllers be considered as air traffic controllers for retirement and for certain other purposes.
